name: NMT01
description: Nimian's Manufacture handheld tesla cannon. Rumours are that this weapon was developed in Soviet Union back then, and that Nimian paid a lot for the specifications of this magnificent weapon. This weapon is extremely damaging, but requires a lot of power to fire.

name: NMT01 mk. 2
description: Nimian's Manufacture handheld tesla cannon. Rumours are that this weapon was developed in Soviet Union back then, and that Nimian paid a lot for the specifications of this magnificent weapon. This weapon is extremely damaging, but requires a lot of power to fire. The mark 2 is even more damaging, and lightning can jump between targets, but it'll drain through charges even faster.

name: NM199 10x62mm
description: Nimian's Manufacture prototype sniper rifle, firing powerful 10x62mm caseless rounds. Made to be as quiet as possible, and also has all that high-tech stuff to reduce weight, recoil and make the gun easy to handle. Holds 3 rounds.
